==SIG-Sauer P226R== | ==SIG-Sauer P226R== |
Latest revision as of 12:04, 13 December 2024
The following weapons were used in Season 21 of the anime series [Case Closed](/wiki/Case_Closed):
Pistols
Beretta 92FS
The [Beretta 92FS](/wiki/Beretta_92FS) is used by the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department's Special Investigation Team (SIT) tactical teams.
Glock 17
[Glock 17s](/wiki/Glock_17) appear to be seen in "Detectives' Nocturne (Deduction)".
SIG-Sauer P226
A [SIG-Sauer P226](/wiki/SIG-Sauer_P226) appears to be seen with Isao Sawaguri in "The Case of the Besieged Detective Agency (Outbreak)".
SIG-Sauer P226R
A [SIG-Sauer P226R](/wiki/SIG-Sauer_P226R) is seen with an armed suspect in "The Case of the Besieged Detective Agency (Sniping)".
Tokarev TT-33
The [Tokarev TT-33](/wiki/Tokarev_TT-33) is seen with various bad guys in the season.
Trump Gun
Kaitô Kid uses the Trump Gun in the OP sequence, "Kimi no Namida ni Konna ni Koi Shiteru".
Revolvers
Smith & Wesson Model 1
The [Smith & Wesson Model 1](/wiki/Smith_%26_Wesson_Model_1) is seen throughout "Nagasaki Mystery Theater (Bakumatsu Part)".
Sniper Rifles
Howa M1500
The [Howa M1500](/wiki/Howa_M1500) is used by Special Assault Team (SAT) snipers deployed during a hostage crisis.
Grenades
Flashbang
A generic flashbang is used by SIT assaulters during a hostage rescue op in "The Case of the Besieged Detective Agency (Sniping)".
